qas.question: New Delhi played host to what major athletic competition in 2010?
New Delhi first hosted the Asian Games in what year?
The Asian Games were most recently held in New Delhi in what year?
New Delhi's bid for the 2019 Asian Games was turned down by the government for what reason?
New Delhi is the annual host of what foot-race?

context: The city hosted the 2010 <a0_0>Commonwealth Games<a0_0/> and annually hosts <a4_0>Delhi Half Marathon<a4_0/> foot-race. The city has previously hosted the <a1_0>1951<a1_0/> Asian Games and the <a2_0>1982<a2_0/> Asian Games. New Delhi was interested  in bidding for the 2019 Asian Games but was turned down by the government on 2 August 2010 amid <a3_0>allegations of corruption<a3_0/> in 2010 Commonwealth Games .
